projects.title: Multilingual Chatbot Evaluation Framework
projects.description: Evaluation framework for multilingual chatbots supporting Chinese, Korean, Japanese, and Hebrew. Features synthetic dataset creation, LLM fine-tuning with RAG systems, and automated model routing for production deployment.

projects.title: Bird Migration & Light Pollution Analysis
projects.description: Conservation technology project quantifying urban light pollution's effects on nocturnal bird migration. Integrates NASA VIIRS radiance data with BirdCast migration metrics through XGBoost and Random Forest models for policy recommendations.

projects.title: World Happiness Clustering
projects.description: Machine learning clustering analysis of World Happiness Report data using K-means to group 164 countries by GDP, social support, health, freedom, generosity, and corruption factors. Applied PCA visualization and elbow method for optimal cluster selection.

projects.title: UniRide
projects.description: Mobile platform addressing transportation barriers for HBCU students at isolated campuses. Features real-time shuttle tracking and student ridesharing with fixed routes to essential destinations based on research revealing 76% distrust current shuttle schedules.

projects.title: ClassSync
projects.description: A privacy-first automated attendance iOS application currently being implemented at a major university. Features proximity detection, FaceID authentication, and real-time attendance tracking with elegant SwiftUI design.

projects.title: AidPoint
projects.description: A Progressive Web App (PWA) that helps users easily locate and contact emergency resources with or without internet access. Built with React and Google Maps API, it offers an interactive map, offline-first functionality, one-touch calling, and cross-platform installation.

projects.title: Holidays Python Package
projects.description: Contributed to the holidays library (544 forks, PyPI package) supporting 219 countries for government-designated holiday generation. Implemented complete Turks and Caicos Islands holiday support with comprehensive unit testing and documentation.

projects.title: Space Explorer
projects.description: Full-stack web application integrating NASA's Astronomy Picture of the Day API with interactive educational features. Includes secure authentication, favorites system, space quiz, and responsive design for cross-device compatibility.
